_comment: Bat-virus interactions manually extracted from the literature. See https://www.mdpi.com/1424-2818/9/3/35 for more information.
citation: Willoughby AR, Phelps KL, Olival KJ, Predict Consortium. A comparative analysis of viral richness and viral sharing in cave-roosting bats. Diversity. 2017 Sep;9(3):35.
